BEEP_BEEP.name: Beep Beep!

CAPTURE_THE_WIN.description: Capture 3 flags in one game of CTF.
CAPTURE_THE_WIN.name: Capture The Win!

CHAIN_KILL.description: Kill two players within 5 seconds of each other.
CHAIN_KILL.name: Chain Kill

COLLATERAL_DAMAGE.description: Kill 2 players with one Chain Lightning.
COLLATERAL_DAMAGE.name: Collateral Damage

COMING_THROUGH.description: Get a kill while under the Berserk Ultimate.
COMING_THROUGH.name: Coming Through!

EAGLE_EYED.description: Kill a player in TDM within 30 seconds of respawning.
EAGLE_EYED.name: Eagle Eyed

EXTENSIVE_TRAINING.description: Unlock all the Combat Upgrades for a class.
EXTENSIVE_TRAINING.name: Extensive Training

FEELING_SPECIAL.description: Change your weapon's appearance using the Skin Selector.
FEELING_SPECIAL.name: Feeling Special!

FIRST_OF_MANY.description: Get a Broken Weapon repaired by The Weaponsmith.
FIRST_OF_MANY.name: The First Of Many

GREEN_IS_LOVE.description: Pick up the healing powerup while having less than 100 health remaining.
GREEN_IS_LOVE.name: Green Is Love, Green Is Life

HAMMER_OF_DESTRUCTION.description: Hit 10 targets with only 1 Hammer of Light.
HAMMER_OF_DESTRUCTION.name: Hammer of Destruction

I_GOT_YOU_BRO.description: Use Intervene on a player who is below 500 HP.
I_GOT_YOU_BRO.name: I Got You Bro

I_MUST_RESIST.description: Completely fill up your Broken Weapons inventory.
I_MUST_RESIST.name: I...Must...Resist

JUICED_UP.description: Get a killing blow on an enemy player while under the effect of the damage powerup.
JUICED_UP.name: Juiced Up!

LEGENDARY.description: Receive a Legendary weapon from The Weaponsmith.
LEGENDARY.name: Legen...Wait For It...Dary!

LIFELEECH.description: Heal yourself for a total of at least 1000 health with the Earthliving weapon.
LIFELEECH.name: Lifeleech

MAD_SKILLZ_YO.description: Unlock all the Skill Upgrades for a class.
MAD_SKILLZ_YO.name: Mad Skills, Yo!

MEDIUM_RARE.description: Receive a Rare weapon from The Weaponsmith.
MEDIUM_RARE.name: Medium Rare

NIFTY.description: Survive a game of Team Deathmatch with at least one kill, without dying yourself.
NIFTY.name: Nifty

PURPLE_POWER.description: Receive an Epic weapon from The Weaponsmith.
PURPLE_POWER.name: Purple Power!

SHARDS_FOR_GLORY.description: Fully max a crafted Legendary weapon.
SHARDS_FOR_GLORY.name: Shards for Glory

SLOW_DOWN_THERE.description: Kill someone with a Freezing Breath while holding a flag.
SLOW_DOWN_THERE.name: Slow Down There

SUPER_SOAKER.description: Shoot a Water Bolt that simultaneously lands a killing blow on an enemy and heals a teammate that had less than 25% health remaining.
SUPER_SOAKER.name: Super Soaker

SURPRISE_ATTACK.description: Get a kill at least 50 blocks away with Flame Burst.
SURPRISE_ATTACK.name: Surprise Attack

THAT_WAS_EASY.description: Win by 500 points in Team Deathmatch.
THAT_WAS_EASY.name: That Was Easy

THIS_BETTER_BE_GOOD.description: Perform a Stats Reroll on a Legendary weapon.
THIS_BETTER_BE_GOOD.name: This Better Be Good!

TOTAL_DOMINATION.description: Capture all domination points at once.
TOTAL_DOMINATION.name: Total Domination

ASSIST.description: Earn %s assists in any game mode
ASSIST.name: Quit Stealing My Kills!

CTF_WINS.description: Win %s games of Capture the Flag
CTF_WINS.name: Vexillologist

KILLS.description: Kill %s players in any game mode
KILLS.name: Kill Secured

MAGE_LEVEL.description: Obtain Lv%s with the Mage class.
MAGE_LEVEL.name: Icy Hot

PALADIN_LEVEL.description: Obtain Lv%s with the Paladin class.
PALADIN_LEVEL.name: Knight of Justice

REPAIR_WEAPONS.description: Get %s Broken Weapons repaired by The Weaponsmith.
REPAIR_WEAPONS.name: RNG God Offerings

SHAMAN_LEVEL.description: Obtain Lv%s with the Shaman class.
SHAMAN_LEVEL.name: Master of the Elements

WARRIOR_LEVEL.description: Obtain Lv%s with the Warrior class.
WARRIOR_LEVEL.name: Anger Management
